name: Havana Sungrown Torpedo
additionalNotes: Made by Hendrik Kelner, the famous master blender of some of the worldâ€™s finest cigars and distributed by Alec Bradley Cigar Co., Havana Sun Grown is a medium to full-bodied cigar featuring a very unique Havana-seed, Connecticut Sun Grown wrapper surrounding a special blend of Dominican, Mexican, and Peruvian tobaccos.
